components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Movitel Network in Mozambique

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays to Movitel Network in Mozambique. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays to Movitel Network in Mozambique. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Movitel Network in Mozambique. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: US Numbers in the Porting-in Process Cannot be Configured

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have put out a fix for the phone numbers in the porting-in issue. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PHONE NUMBERS

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have put out a fix for the issue of phone numbers in the porting-in process that cannot be configured. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PHONE NUMBERS

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue of phone numbers in the porting-in process that cannot be configured and are continuing to work to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PHONE NUMBERS

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue of phone numbers in the porting-in process that cannot be configured and are working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PHONE NUMBERS

incident_updates.body:
We are continuing to investigate the issue of phone numbers in the porting-in process that cannot be configured. Customers should now be able to configure phone numbers for existing port requests. However, newly submitted port requests may still be impacted by the issue upon initial submission. Our engineering team is actively investigating the underlying cause and working towards a full resolution.
We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PHONE NUMBERS

incident_updates.body:
We are continuing to investigate the issue of phone numbers in the porting-in process that cannot be configured. Customers should now be able to configure phone numbers for existing port requests. However, newly submitted port requests may still be impacted by the issue upon initial submission. Our engineering team is actively investigating the underlying cause and working towards a full resolution.
We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PHONE NUMBERS

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to investigate the issue of phone numbers in the porting-in process that cannot be configured. Customers should now be able to configure phone numbers for existing port requests. However, newly submitted port requests may still be impacted by the issue upon initial submission. Our engineering team is continuing to investigate and will provide further updates. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PHONE NUMBERS

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to investigated the issue of phone numbers in the porting-in process that cannot be configured. We expect to provide another update in two hour or as soon as more information

affected_components.name: PHONE NUMBERS

incident_updates.body: We are investigating an issue of phone numbers in the porting-in process that cannot be configured. We expect to provide another update in one hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PHONE NUMBERS

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue US Number Porting Requests Created Without Voice Capabilities. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Flex Service Disruption  Customers Unable to Connect

incident_updates.body: We continue to observe recovery and our engineering teams are closely monitoring to ensure recovery is sustained and systems remain stable. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Application Platform
FLEX - TaskRouter

incident_updates.body: We continue to observe recovery and our engineering teams are closely monitoring to ensure recovery is sustained and systems remain stable. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Application Platform
FLEX - TaskRouter

incident_updates.body: We continue to observe recovery and our engineering teams are closely monitoring to ensure recovery is sustained and systems remain stable. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Application Platform
FLEX - TaskRouter

incident_updates.body: Our engineering team has identified the issue and fixed it, and we continue to observe recovery. Engineering teams are closely monitoring to ensure recovery is sustained and systems remain stable. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Application Platform
FLEX - TaskRouter

incident_updates.body: Our engineering team has identified the issue and fixed it and we are currently observing positive signs of recovery. We are continuing to monitor the system closely to ensure stability over the next 4 hours. During this time, some customers may experience session logouts. If this occurs, please log back in. We do not anticipate any additional errors. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Application Platform
FLEX - TaskRouter

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue impacting Flex customers. This issue would result in customers being unable to login to Flex. They may also experience web socket connection errors, or customers could have seen the following error: We have detected a problem with the service. Our engineering teams are actively working to restore full service as quickly as possible. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Application Platform
FLEX - TaskRouter

incident_updates.body:
We're continuing to investigate issues impacting multiple Flex customers. Customers utilizing Flex and Task Router began experiencing errors when logging in. This would result in customers being unable to login to Flex. They may also experience web socket connection errors, or customers seeing the following errors: We have detected a problem with the service. Our engineering teams are actively working to identify the root cause and restore full service as quickly as possible.

For customer support assistance, please log in to your Twilio or Twilio SendGrid account and submit a support ticket. Well provide another update in 30 minutes.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Application Platform
FLEX - TaskRouter

incident_updates.body:
We are currently investigating an issue impacting multiple Flex customers who are unable to connect to Twilio servers. Our engineering teams are actively working to identify the root cause and restore full service as quickly as possible. 

For customer support assistance, please log in to your Twilio or Twilio SendGrid account and submit a support ticket. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Application Platform
FLEX - TaskRouter

incident_updates.body: Our engineering team is actively investigating an issue with Flex Instances and Taskrouter. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as we have additional information.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Application Platform
FLEX - TaskRouter

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Flex instances. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Application Platform

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Vodafone United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 November 2025 at 15:00 PST until 25 November 2025 at 18:45 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Product: Lookup Identity Match

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Identity Match

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States and Canada Twilio SMS and MMS Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 November 2025 at 20:00 PST until 26 November 2025 at 00:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays or failures delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets via subset of long codes, short codes and toll free numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio  Flex Plugins Database in US1 Region - Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Were conducting a planned maintenance in US1 region between 5:45 PM to 7:15 PM Pacific Time on 12/05/2025. During the maintenance window, We would be updating Flex Plugins database in US1 region. There are pre and post update activities around this maintenance and hence this longer maintenance window. The actual database cut-over is expected to take approximately 5 minutes. Monitoring: Our team will closely watch the system performance during and after this maintenance window as well to ensure everything runs smoothly. Contingency plan: In the unlikely event of encountering any issues, we are prepared to immediately revert the changes. Should a rollback be deemed necessary, then there could be a short downtime of approximately 5 minutes.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Insights
FLEX - Flex Plugins

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 10 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 26 November 2025 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

10 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 10 November 2025 at 16:00 PST
12 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 12 November 2025 at 16:00 PST
17 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 17 November 2025 at 16:00 PST
24 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 24 November 2025 at 16:00 PST
26 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 26 November 2025 at 16:00 PST

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe
